title.rendered: SSHS Named as a U.S News & World Report Best High School

content.rendered:
The U.S. News and World Report recently named Saratoga Springs High School to their list of best high schools. View the profile for Saratoga Springs High School.

The U.S. News Best High Schools rankings include data on nearly 25,000 public high schools in 50 states and the District of Columbia. Schools are ranked based on their performance on state-required tests, graduation rates, and how well they prepare students for college.
